# Search Everything

# Description

Searches for everything in Smartsheet based on a query search.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Query - The text with which to perform the search. Use double-quotes for an exact search. This field supports String type input.
* Scopes - Select one of the available options in the drop-down list. This field supports String type input.
* File - Click to use a variable. This field supports IResource type input.





* Comment attachment - Automatically generated output variable.
